room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: Eight of us, ranging from 9 years to teens to parents to grand parents played Island Escape. We had a great time. We found the staff helpful and friendly. Definitely would do again

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: Definitely better than any escape room I've been to so far!  My brother and I did the Island Escape.  Very nice decor and high-tech puzzles.  Electro-magnets, compressed air, special privacy filter glasses, etc.  We failed to escape but had a blast anyway!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: We had such a great time here tonight! It was our very first escape room experience and it was amazing! Shout out to our game master Austin for being so patient with us! We'll definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: Tons of fun. Worth the money. I was a bit hesitant at first because my group wasnt a full 8 so we had the chance of getting paired up with strangers. That did end up happening, but it was actually really fun. They ended up being helpful and it was really fun.

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: What a great experience with my family! One team did the Island Escape and the other did Casino. We all had a great time. So close to escaping but fell short by a couple clues. Great staff! Great rooms!! We'll be back!!
